description: The file that specifies either 9slice texture or Aseprite flipbook.
title: UI Texture File

oneOf.description: Offset from left, top, right and bottom of the texture file.
Offsets from left, top, right and bottom of the texture file (in this exact order).

base_size.title: Size of the texture
base_size.description: Width and height of the texture (in this exact order).

B.description: The file that specifies Aseprite/libresprite flipbook animation.
B.title: Aseprite Flipbook File

meta.description: The meta data of the flipbook.

size.description: The size of the flipbook sprite sheet.

w.description: The width of the sprite sheet.

h.description: The height of the sprite sheet.

image.description: The path to the sprite sheet. The value is required, but not used.

duration.description: The duration of the frame in milliseconds.

frame.description: The position of the frame in the sprite sheet (UV).

x.description: The x position of the frame in the sprite sheet.

y.description: The y position of the frame in the sprite sheet.
